resources.string: You need to fill everything before proceeding!
Use fingerprint sensor instead of auto login
The server has exceeded the time it was expected to give an answer, try again later!
Server is not responding, try again later!
If you came across a movie or a tv show that has no thumbnail, you can help us by uploading a thumbnail yourself to the title in question so that we can grow our thumbnail database.
Title of movie or tv show (Must be original title)
Place your finger on the finger print sensor to verify your identity!
The server is not responding at the moment, please try again later!
The code you entered is wrong!
The password field must contain at least 8 characters long, 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number and 1 symbol! The symbol cannot be a semi-colon \";\"!
Your new password can\'t be the same as your current password!
The code is not case sensitive.
The name field can only contain letters and spaces!
You need to input your full name!
The name field can not have more than 50 characters!
The username field can not have more than 15 characters!
The title cannot have more than 60 characters!
The email field can not have more than 80 characters!
That email address is not valid!
The username can only contain letters, numbers and dots!
Describe the bug and if \npossible provide the necessary \nsteps for me to reproduce it.
In order to activate this functionality you need to enroll at least one fingerprint and you need to secure your lock screen with a pattern, a password or a pin!
Your finger print does not match!
You\'ve cancelled the finger print authentication!
You\'ve failed to match your finger print too many times, the finger print sensor is now locked for 30 seconds!
You did not granted permission for the app to use finger print sensor, would you want to do that now?
You denied again the permission to use the finger print sensor, without it the app cannot use the finger print sensor to authenticate you! The app will now close!
The watched time field cannot have more than 8 characters!
Max time for watched time field is 03:59:59!
The season field cannot have more than 2 characters
The episode field cannot have more than 2 characters!
You are not currently watching any movie.
Do you want to edit it?
Do you want to edit this
Your changes were successfully saved and will be sent to the server once you get your internet connection back.
You are not currently watching any tv show.
Do you want to delete this
You don\'t have anything to delete!
Are you sure you want to delete your account? Your photo, personal information and every tvshow and movie information will be deleted and cannot be retrieved back! Proceed?
Your device does not support in app purchases!
Billing has failed for some reason!
It seems there is something wrong with your user, it appears that it no longer exists! You will be logged out from the application, try to login again or use a diferent user account!
You need to click on the remember me checkbox when you login to be able to use this functionality!
You need to select an image before proceeding!
Get the premium features for free

If you want the premium features for free, wait no more you can have them by watching some videos from our partners! Once you\'ve watched all videos you will receive the premium package free of charge!
The rewarded video failed to load! Please try again later!
Congratulations! You are now a premium user!
An error occurred while trying to update the rewarded videos! Try again later!
You have to wait a little bit to watch another video!
Your google sign in failed, check your account!
There\'s already an user registered with that email address, do you want to link this google account?
Failed to connect to google, try again later!
Are you sure you want to unlink your google account? You will have to link it again if you want to use it in the future. Proceed?
You have successfully unlinked your google account!
It was not possible to unlink your google account right now, try again later!
